Verses: 1 buththiyillaadha Kalaaththiyare, Neengal Saththiyaththirkuk Keezhppadiyaamarpogaththakkadhaaga Ungalai Mayakkinavan Yaar? Yesukiristhu Siluvaiyilaraiyappattavaraaga Ungal Kangalukkumun Piraththiyatchamaai Ungalukkulle Velippaduththappattirundhaare.
2 ondraimaaththiram Ungalidaththil Ariyavirumbugiren; Niyaayappiramaanaththin Kiriyaigalinaaleyo, Visuvaasak Kelviyinaaleyo, Edhinaale Aaviyaip Petreergal?
3 aaviyinaale Aarambampannina Neengal Ippozhudhu Maamsaththinaale Mudivuperappogireergalo? Neengal Iththanai Puththiyeenaraa?
4 iththanai Paadugalaiyum Veenaaip Patteergalo? Avaigal Veenaaippoyitre.
5 andriyum Ungalukku Aaviyai Aliththu, Ungalukkulle Arpudhangalai Nadappikkiravar Adhai Niyaayappiramaanaththin Kiriyaigalinaaleyo, Visuvaasak Kelviyinaaleyo, Edhinaale Seygiraar?
6 appadiye Aabiragaam Dhevanai Visuvaasiththaan, Adhu Avanukku Needhiyaaga Ennappattadhu.
7 aagaiyaal Visuvaasamaarkkaththaargal Evargalo Avargale Aabiragaamin Pillaigalendru Ariveergalaaga.

8 melum Dhevan Visuvaasaththinaale Purajaadhgalai Needhimaangalaakkugiraarendru Vedham Munnaagak Kandu: Unakkul Sagala Jaadhigalum Aaseervadhikkappadum Endru Aabiragaamukku Suviseshamaai Munnariviththadhu.
9 andhappadi Visuvaasamaarkkaththaar Visuvaasamulla Aabiragaamudane Aaseervadhikkappadugiraargal.

10 niyaayappiramaanaththin Kiriyaikkaararaagiya Yaavarum Saabaththirkutpattirukkiraargal; Niyaayappiramaana Pusthagaththil Ezhudhappattavaigalaiyellaam Seyyaththakkadhaaga Avaigalil Nilaiththiraadhavan Evano Avan Sabikkappattavan Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe.
11 niyaayappiramaanaththinaale Oruvanum Dhevanidaththil Needhimaanaagiradhillaiyenpadhu Veliyarangamaayirukkiradhu. Enenil, Visuvaasaththinaale Needhimaan Pizhaippaan Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe.
12 niyaayappiramaanamo Visuvaasaththirkuriyadhalla; Avaigalaich Seygira Manushane Avaigalaal Pizhaippaan.
13 maraththile Thookkappatta Evanum Sabikkappattavan Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Kiristhu Namakkaaga Saabamaagi, Niyaayappiramaanaththin Saabaththirku Nammai Neengalaakki Meettukkondaar.

14 aabiragaamukku Undaana Aaseervaadham Kiristhu Yesuvinaal Purajaadhigalukku Varumpadiyaagavum, Aaviyaikkuriththu Sollappatta Vaakkuththaththaththai Naam Visuvaasaththinaale Perumpadiyaagavum Ippadiyaayitru.
15 sagodharare, Manushar Muraimaiyinpadi Sollugiren; Manushargalukkulle Urudhipannappatta Udanpadikkaiyai Oruvanum Thallugiradhumillai, Adhinode Ondraiyum Koottugiradhumillai.

16 aabiragaamukkum Avanudaiya Sandhadhikkum Vaakkuththaththangal Pannappattana; Sandhadhigalukku Endru Anegaraikkuriththuch Chollaamal, Un Sandhadhikku Endru Oruvanaikkuriththuch Cholliyirukkiraar, Andha Sandhadhi Kiristhuve.

17 aadhalaal Naan Sollugiradhennavenil, Kiristhuvai Munnittu Dhevanaal Mun Urudhipannappatta Udanpadikkaiyai Naanootrumuppadhu Varushaththirkuppinbu Undaana Niyaayappiramaanamaanadhu Thalli, Vaakkuththaththaththai Viyarththamaakkamaattaadhu.
18 andriyum, Sudhandharamaanadhu Niyaayappiramaanaththinaale Undaanaal Adhu Vaakkuththaththaththinaale Undaayiraadhu; Dhevan Adhai Aabiragaamukku Vaakkuththaththaththinaale Arulichcheydhaare.

19 appadiyaanaal, Niyaayappiramaanaththin Nokkamenna? Vaakkuththaththaththaippetra Sandhadhi Varumalavum Adhu Akkiramangalinimiththamaagak Koottappattu, Dhevathoodharaikkondu Maththiyasthan Kaiyile Kattalaiyidappattadhu.
20 maththiyasthan Oruvanukkuriyavanalla, Dhevano Oruvar.

21 appadiyaanaal, Niyaayappiramaanam Dhevanudaiya Vaakkuththaththangalukku Virodhamaa? Allave; Uyiraik Kodukkaththakka Niyaayappiramaanam Arulappattirundhadhaanaal, Needhiyaanadhu Niyaayappiramaanaththinaal Undaayirukkume.

22 appadiyiraadhapadiyaal, Yesukiristhuvaip Patrum Visuvaasaththinaale Palikkira Vaakkuththaththam Visuvaasamullavargalukku Alikkappadumpadi Vedham Ellaaraiyum Egamaaip Paavaththinkeezh Adaiththuppottadhu.
23 aadhalaal Visuvaasam Varugiradharkumunne, Velippadappogira Visuvaasaththirku Edhuvaaga Naam Adaikkappattavargalaai Niyaayappiramaanaththinkeezh Kaaval Pannappattirundhom.
24 ivvidhamaaga, Naam Visuvaasaththile Needhimaangalaakkappaduvadharku Niyaayappiramaanam Nammaik Kiristhuvinidaththil Vazhinadaththugira Upaaththiyaai Irundhadhu.
25 visuvaasam Vandhapinbu Naam Upaaththikkuk Keezhaanavargalallave.
26 neengalellaarum Kiristhu Yesuvaippatrum Visuvaasaththinaal Dhevanudaiya Puththiraraayirukkireergale.
27 enenil, Ungalil Kiristhuvukkullaaga, Gnaanasnaanam Petravargal Eththanaipero Aththanaiperum Kiristhuvaith Thariththukkondeergale.
28 yoodhanendrum Girekkanendrumillai, Adimaiyendrum Suyaadheenanendrumillai, Aanendrum Pennendrumillai; Neengalellaarum Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Ondraayirukkireergal.
29 neengal Kiristhuvinudaiyavargalaanaal, Aabiragaamin Sandhadhiyaaraayum, Vaakkuththaththaththinpadiye Sudhandhararaayumirukkireergal.
